paymentMethodSelectionPages.question: How would you like to pay on board?

paymentInfoModal.description: Resilient Lady is a cashless vessel which means you pay for everything with The Band. We need to either hold a credit card for you or collect a cash deposit for you to use The Band.
paymentInfoModal.title: Onboard payment

dependentsSection.pendingPaymentDependentDescription: That's really kind of you. Just be aware — you'll be responsible for whoever you add and everything they do (financially, of course).
dependentsSection.completedPaymentDependentDescription: These Sailors have already set up their payment method. You can overwrite them, but you should *probably* check with them first. But hey, your call.

deleteCardModal.description: Are you sure? You'll need to select another onboard payment method.
deleteCardModal.title: Delete Payment card?

existingCardModal.description: Looks like you already have a card on file.
existingCardModal.title: Quick question...

introPage.description: Like to pay like it’s 1999? Resilient Lady is a cashless vessel, but you can take those actual paper dollars to Sailor Services once you're on board, and we'll add it to your Band as credit. (minimum deposit $200).
introPage.title: Pay using cash

reviewPage.description: Like to pay like it’s 1999? Resilient Lady is a cashless vessel, but you can take those actual paper dollars to Sailor Services once you're on board, and we'll add it to your Band as credit. (minimum deposit $200).
reviewPage.title: Cash deposit

introPage.description: Traveling with someone else and would prefer use one payment method? No problem — they just need to confirm you on their account and you'll be good to go.
introPage.title: Someone else footing the bill?

reviewPage.description: {Name}’s going to cover your expenses on board, you lucky thing.
reviewPage.title: Someone else footing the bill?
